title: I keep disconnecting
body: Everytime i get on LoL it works fine and smooth. But when im in the loading screen, the same "Network Error" keeps popping up but my internet is fine. So then i have to restart my client and it takes sometime. And then by the time I get in game they either remake or my lane is destroyed. And there's no problem with my internet so idk what to do :/

replies.body: It sounds like your network is working pretty normally up until the point where it needs to connect to our game servers. Let's first make sure your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are still configured in the best way for League to run, but let me know if that doesn't seem to help.
